title: Distribution of business
introduction: Ishare has been committed to providing customers with the best quality PCBA intelligent manufacturing related services, pursuing the service concept of "sharing with customers, sharing with society". With professional technical team and excellent service quality, the company has been in a state of rapid development, with business covering more than 20 provinces in China, overseas markets covering the United States, Mexico, Japan, India, Vietnam, Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore and other countries.
